Description: Sherd from body of Carian pottery skyphos; black glaze inside; exterior, cream slip: two bands below handle zone; in handle panel, water bird to left; panel bounded on right by chevrons between pairs of verticals; trace of further vertical motif at right break. Drilled for analysis.
Curator's comments: NAA by Hans Mommsen (Bonn) indicates production in Caria.
Joins the lip fragment Greenock, McLean Museum and Art Gallery, 1987.464.
Bibliographic references: Williams & Villing 2006 / Carian Mercenaries at Naukratis? (p.47 fig.1, no.1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GP.02)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 166-8, Nau 138, pl. 30a-b)
